name: SEO Speed Test
tagline: Google & ChatGPT ignore slow pages, check if yours is fast!
description: 75% of sites fail Core Web Vitals. Check if you're losing rankings to faster competitors. Real user data from Chrome UX Report.

name: Watchman AI
tagline: Capturing invisible B2B buyers with AI agents
description: Watchman’s AI agents capture invisible B2B buyers and unlock your hidden revenue — delivering endless pipelines of qualified accounts and enriched leads by automating the identification, research, and qualification of your anonymous web visitors.

name: Cipher by Byterover
tagline: Open-source, shared memory for coding agents
description: Cipher is an open-source memory layer, connected to AI IDEs and CLIs through MCP. Auto-generate coding memories that scale with your code-base, auto-retrieve relevant coding memories and knowledge across IDEs, projects and teams.

name: Hypertune
tagline: Type-safe feature flags, optimized for React and Next.js
description: Hypertune is the most flexible platform for feature flags, A/B testing, analytics and app configuration. Optimized for TypeScript, React and Next.js.

name: Deposure
tagline: Launch your APIs live effortlessly
description: Instantly expose your local services to the internet — no DevOps, no bandwidth limits, no cost. Perfect for APIs, webhooks, dashboards, and IoT. Just one CLI command and you're live. 100% free. No config. No limits.

name: Standout
tagline: Your personal AI headhunter on WhatsApp to find startup jobs
description: Standout is a superconnected AI Headhunter. After a call, it learns your goals, filters inbound, and scans 1000s of startup roles to deliver curated matches and warm founder intros. Don't miss opportunities, skip the back-and-forth, and interview faster.

name: Seed Diffusion
tagline: A faster, more holistic way to generate code
description: Seed Diffusion is an experimental open-source diffusion language model by the ByteDance Seed team. It achieves a 5.4x inference speedup over comparable autoregressive models for code generation, with strong performance.

name: aequsy
tagline: Win unforgettable experiences by supporting real causes
description: Aequsy lets you support real-world causes for a shot at life-changing experiences. Choose a hero goal, back it, and when the timer ends, the cause gets support, and one backer wins a reward. All transparent. All verifiable. All on blockchain.

name: SunQuest
tagline: Know where the sun will be — and if solar is worth it.
description: Want to know where the sun will be? ☀️ SunQuest shows you — anywhere, anytime. Especially useful this summer to beat the heat, plan outdoor activities, or take photos. Get a full 10-day weather forecast. Simulate solar potential to see if panels are worth it.

name: 150+ Prompt Chain Templates
tagline: Build fast & better with ChatGPT prompt sequence automations
description: Launch faster with 150+ ready-to-run prompt-native ChatGPT workflows. No code, no fluff—just plug-and-play chains built to scale. What will you automate first?

name: Datoshi – Your AI Data Buddy
tagline: From raw data to dashboards with a buddy who learns ur logic
description: Solid secure AI chat for files, databases, docs + live auto-refresh dashboards + ContextLens memory graph (no hallucinations across thousands of tables) for data-driven teams tired of backlogs and stale dashboards.

name: Revenue Atlas
tagline: Real-time dashboard of your Stripe customers by country
description: Revenue Atlas shows where your Stripe revenue comes from - by country. Get a simple, visual dashboard with country-level breakdowns and CSV export. No setup.

name: Nope It
tagline: Transform impulse buys into your dream investments!
description: Nope It is a simple Progressive Web App(PWA) that uses behavioral psychology to help you control impulse spending. Log your impulses, reflect with our science-backed framework, and funnel the money you save toward your real dream goals.

name: Tegant - Censorship-Resistant VPN
tagline: Bypass censorship with WireGuard and Xray protocols
description: 7-year-old VPN. Multi-protocol: WireGuard for speed; VLESS+REALITY, VMess+WebSocket, Trojan+TLS for censorship bypass. Private AdGuard DNS, zero logs. Freemium/Premium. UK-based. Works in China/UAE. Banned in Russia for working too well.

name: QuitDate - Quit Smoking Buddy
tagline: Quit smoking & stay smoke free
description: Feel healthier, save money, and stay in control by tracking smoke cravings, logging slips without guilt, and understanding what triggers you.

name: IndieReq
tagline: Ship features customers (actually) want
description: IndieReq is a minimal-setup user feedback board built specifically for indie developers to get feedback quickly so they know what to build & ship. Sign up for FREE, create a board, and start getting requests, upvotes, and comments from your users!

name: Free BangoCat Overlay on Mac
tagline: Free bangocat overlay for Mac
description: Free BangoCat Overlay for macOS. I played the BangoCat game on Steam and found no version for my Mac, so I made one. It's so fun to have this little companion typing alongside you. Hope you'll love it too !

name: Koirousel.com
tagline: Simple, Free Carousel/Slideshow Maker for Instagram & Tiktok
description: Free carousel and short reels for tiktok and instagram - no login required! Upload/generate images and text, customise styles and then export as JPGs/PNGs/MP4s in minutes

name: Tubify.ai
tagline: TubeHI — Say Hi to Your Content!
description: TubeHI is your assistant for fast creation of vibrant videos and content for YouTube and social media. With a simple interface, AI-generated text, voiceover, and easy editing, it helps you make popular, high-quality content.

name: Lunos - AI Gateway
tagline: Get free access to GPT model & any AI provider easily
description: Lunos is a unified API gateway that lets developers access multiple AI providers like OpenAI, xAI, Google, and more from one place, with one key.

name: SEO Speed Test
tagline: Google & ChatGPT ignore slow pages, check if yours is fast!
description: 75% of sites fail Core Web Vitals. Check if you're losing rankings to faster competitors. Real user data from Chrome UX Report.
